verses.name: Galatians 3:5
verses.text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit, and worketh miracles among you, doeth he it by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?

verses.name: Galatians 3:6
verses.text: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.

verses.name: Galatians 3:7
verses.text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith, the same are the children of Abraham.

verses.name: Galatians 3:8
verses.text: And the scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith, preached before the gospel unto Abraham, saying, In thee shall all nations be blessed.

verses.name: Galatians 3:9
verses.text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham.
